2:
Yahweh looks down from heaven on the children of mankind\q to see if there are any who understand,
\q who seek after him.
\q
3:
They have all turned away. Together they have become corrupt.\q There is no one who does good, no, not one.


\q
4:
Do they not know anything, those who commit iniquity,\q those who eat up my people as they eat bread,
\q but who do not call on Yahweh?


\q
5:
They tremble with dread,\q for God is with the righteous assembly!
\q
6:
You want to humiliate the poor person\q even though Yahweh is his refuge.


\q
7:
Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come from Zion!\q When Yahweh brings back his people from the captivity,
\q then Jacob will rejoice and Israel will be glad!
